com.cmput301w20t23.newber.database

Class DatabaseAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.cmput301w20t23.newber.database.DatabaseAdapter

  • public class DatabaseAdapter
extends java.util.Observable
    Singleton class for accessing the Firestore database across the entire app

        Parameters:
        rideRequest - The ride request to be deleted

        Parameters:
        rideRequest - The updated ride request, its ID is still the same

      • getPendingRideRequests

        public void getPendingRideRequests(Callback<java.util.ArrayList<RideRequest>> callback)
        Returns all ride requests that have a status of PENDING in the call back function
        Parameters:
        callback - The callback function, which holds the list of ride requests, that will be returned to the views
